thread.title: Mark Zuckerberg reveals plans to start Primary School with wife Priscilla Chan, ahead of India visit on October 28
thread.title_full: Mark Zuckerberg reveals plans to start Primary School with wife Priscilla Chan, ahead of India visit on October 28 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mark Zuckerberg reveals plans to start Primary School with wife Priscilla Chan, ahead of India visit on October 28
text: Mark Zuckerberg is visiting India to conduct a town hall in Delhi on October 28. With less than a week to the event, the Facebook CEO has announced a completely new venture along with his wife Priscilla Chan. The husband and wife are starting a school, but with a twist. Instead of just providing education , ‘The Primary School’ as they call it, will offer education as well as healthcare for each child until they have graduated. “I’m so proud of Priscilla for starting The Primary School — a new kind of school that brings education and healthcare together,” Zuckerberg wrote in a Facebook post. The school’s aim is to provide healthcare and education to kids from low-income families. The school site will also »
